languages.text: {n}Однако после возвращения чистильщиков в родные цеха были зафиксированы новые мелкие вспышки техномутаций. Они не стали неожиданностью и были быстро локализованы, но производственные процессы планеты потерпели ущерб.{/n}

{n}However, after the Tech-Purgators returned to their workshops, new, smaller outbreaks of tech-mutations were detected. They did not come as a surprise and were isolated quickly, but the production processes of the planet suffered some damage.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Однако после возвращения чистильщиков в родные цеха были зафиксированы новые мелкие вспышки техномутаций. Они не стали неожиданностью и были быстро локализованы, но производственные процессы планеты потерпели ущерб.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}However, after the return of the Tech-Sweepers to their home workshops, the new, smaller, outbreaks of tech-mutations have been detected. They did not come as a surprise and were isolated quickly, but the production processes of the planet have suffered some damage.{/n}

{n}However, after the return of the Tech-Sweepers to their home workshops, the new, smaller, outbreaks of tech-mutations have been detected. They did not come as a surprise and were isolated quickly, but the production processes of the planet have suffered some damage.{/n}

{n}However, after the Tech-Purgators returned to their workshops, new, smaller outbreaks of tech-mutations were detected. They did not come as a surprise and were isolated quickly, but the production processes of the planet suffered some damage.{/n}

{n}However, after the Tech-Purgators returned to their workshops, new, smaller outbreaks of tech-mutations have been detected. They did not come as a surprise and were isolated quickly, but the production processes of the planet have suffered some damage.{/n}

{n}However, after the Tech-Purgators returned to their workshops, new, smaller outbreaks of tech-mutations have been detected. They did not come as a surprise and were isolated quickly, but the production processes of the planet have suffered some damage.{/n}

{n}However, after the Tech-Purgators returned to their workshops, new, smaller outbreaks of tech-mutations were detected. They did not come as a surprise and were isolated quickly, but the production processes of the planet suffered some damage.{/n}

{n}However, after the Tech-Purgators returned to their workshops, new, smaller outbreaks of tech-mutations were detected. They did not come as a surprise and were isolated quickly, but the production processes of the planet suffered some damage.{/n}

{n}However, after the Tech-Purgators returned to their workshops, new, smaller outbreaks of tech-mutations were detected. They did not come as a surprise and were isolated quickly, but the production processes of the planet suffered some damage.{/n}

languages.text: {n}然而，技术净化者返回各自的车间之后，这些车间又爆发了新的小规模技术突变。这样的情况并不令人感到意外，而受影响的区域也很快就被隔离了。不过，行星工厂的生产受到了一定程度的干扰。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}However, after the Tech-Purgators returned to their workshops, new, smaller outbreaks of tech-mutations were detected. They did not come as a surprise and were isolated quickly, but the production processes of the planet suffered some damage.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}然而，技术净化者返回各自的车间之后，这些车间又爆发了新的小规模技术突变。这样的情况并不令人感到意外，而受影响的区域也很快就被隔离了。不过，行星工厂的生产受到了一定程度的干扰。{/n}
{n}然而，技术净化者返回各自的车间之后，这些车间又爆发了新的小规模技术突变。这样的情况并不令人感到意外，而受影响的区域也很快就被隔离了。不过，行星工厂的生产过程受到了一定程度的干扰。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sin embargo, después de que los tecnopurgadores regresaran a sus talleres, se han detectado nuevos brotes, más pequeños, de mutaciones tecnológicas. No fueron una sorpresa y se aislaron rápidamente, pero los procesos de producción del planeta han sufrido algunos daños.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}However, after the Tech-Purgators returned to their workshops, new, smaller outbreaks of tech-mutations were detected. They did not come as a surprise and were isolated quickly, but the production processes of the planet suffered some damage.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sin embargo, después de que los tecnopurgadores regresaran a sus talleres, se han detectado nuevos brotes, más pequeños, de mutaciones tecnológicas. No fueron una sorpresa y se aislaron rápidamente, pero los procesos de producción del planeta han sufrido algunos daños.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ところが、技術断罪者が工房に戻ると、新しい小規模な技術変異の発生が検出された。これらの変異は、驚きをもたらすことなくすぐに隔離されたが、この惑星の生産工程には多少の損害を及ぼすこととなった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}However, after the Tech-Purgators returned to their workshops, new, smaller outbreaks of tech-mutations were detected. They did not come as a surprise and were isolated quickly, but the production processes of the planet suffered some damage.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ところが、技術断罪者が工房に戻ると、新しい小規模な技術変異の発生が検出された。これらの変異は、驚きをもたらすことなくすぐに隔離されたが、この惑星の生産工程には多少の損害を及ぼすこととなった。{/n}
{n}ところが、技術断罪者が工房に戻ると、新しい小規模な技術変異の発生が検出された。これらの変異は、驚きをもたらすことなくすぐに隔離されたが、この惑星の生産工程には多少の損害を及ぼすこととなった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cependant, à peine les technopurificateurs ont-ils regagné leurs ateliers que de nouveaux foyers de mutations technologiques apparaissent, bien que de moindre importance. Ces phénomènes étaient prévisibles et sont isolés rapidement, mais les capacités de production de la planète en pâtissent.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}However, after the Tech-Purgators returned to their workshops, new, smaller outbreaks of tech-mutations were detected. They did not come as a surprise and were isolated quickly, but the production processes of the planet suffered some damage.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cependant, à peine les technopurificateurs ont-ils regagné leurs ateliers que de nouveaux foyers de mutations technologiques apparaissent, bien que de moindre importance. Ces phénomènes étaient prévisibles et sont isolés rapidement, mais les capacités de production de la planète en pâtissent.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Nachdem die Tech-Purgatoren jedoch in ihre Werkstätten zurückgekehrt sind, wurden neue, kleinere Ausbrüche von Tech-Mutationen entdeckt. Sie kamen nicht überraschend und konnten schnell isoliert werden, hatten jedoch einige negative Auswirkungen auf die Produktionsprozesse auf dem Planeten.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}However, after the Tech-Purgators returned to their workshops, new, smaller outbreaks of tech-mutations were detected. They did not come as a surprise and were isolated quickly, but the production processes of the planet suffered some damage.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Nachdem die Tech-Purgatoren jedoch in ihre Werkstätten zurückgekehrt sind, wurden neue, kleinere Ausbrüche von Tech-Mutationen entdeckt. Sie kamen nicht überraschend und konnten schnell isoliert werden, hatten jedoch einige negative Auswirkungen auf die Produktionsprozesse auf dem Planeten.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ancak Tekno Tasfiyeciler atölyelerine döndükten sonra yeni ve daha küçük çaplı tekno mutasyonlar ortaya çıktı. Şaşırtmayan bu vakalar çabuklukla izole edilse de neticede gezegenin üretim hattı bir derece zarar gördü.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}However, after the Tech-Purgators returned to their workshops, new, smaller outbreaks of tech-mutations were detected. They did not come as a surprise and were isolated quickly, but the production processes of the planet suffered some damage.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ancak Tekno Tasfiyeciler atölyelerine döndükten sonra yeni ve daha küçük çaplı tekno mutasyonlar ortaya çıktı. Şaşırtmayan bu vakalar çabuklukla izole edilse de neticede gezegenin üretim hattı bir derece zarar gördü.{/n}
